WorkItem.Description:
TypeScript 0.8.1
Windows XP @SP3

When I try to compile empty ts file I get an error:

    >tsc index.ts
    Unknown extension for file: "index.ts". Only .ts and .d.ts extensions are allowed.

(on 0.8.0 error was: "Error reading file "index.ts": File not found").

Additionaly when I add one comment line in `index.ts` there are no errors but typescript doesn't create empty index.js (i.e. it doesn't do anything).
